name: Trustly Group AB
goal: Trustly is a Swedish FinTech company driven by the idea that online banking payments and transfers should be fast, simple and secure for businesses and consumers alike by supporting cross-border payments to and from consumers in 29 European markets.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Digital economy and society, Single market
euInitiatives: Being a payment service provider Trustly focuses on financial regulatory legislation initiatives and for the time being predominantly the second Payment Services Directive.
